$WmMPID_比翼クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_MM_Pair,Face|Lucina! So this is where you were.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|Oh! Father!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_MM_Pair,Face|I've been looking all day for you. I'm
sure you know, but it's the festival.
Would you like to celebrate together?$k$p$nMPID_ルフレ男|That's a nice idea. I can wait here so
you two can enjoy it alone.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|Umm, no, that's OK! I, um, I gotta—$k$p$WmMPID_比翼クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_MM_Pair,Face|Lucina?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|Sorry, I'm a little busy right now.
Gotta go! I'll see you later, father!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_MM_Pair,Face|...Is this the beginning of her
rebellious phase?$k$p$nMPID_ルフレ男|I don't think so... She must have a
good reason for running off...$k$p$Sbs150|
